name: Surveillance State (JRaven, bam547)
description:
Can you locate the saboteur in time? Watch the streets with your array of cameras. Then, when you've located your mark, drop in and give them a good bombarding with dodgeballs galore! Every successful find gives you 10 more seconds of time. How high will your score go before time runs out...?

Models by Google, Alex "SAFFY" Safayan, and Alan Zimmerman via Google Poly.

Work in progress build available now!
